skdetail:

Invocation Name: classroom success
des: Learning Connect is a patented virtual teacher assistant for instructional planning that ensures an increase in student achievement. It allows teachers to access and parallel successful student learning retention tools with their current lessons to create deep, long-lasting connections.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
